name: Laser Run (Piter)
description:
Laser Run

This is an abandoned project of mine. It might have unfixed bugs.

Controls

ASD - Move Left, Down, Right

Space or W - Jump

S - Accelerate downwards

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

How to play

Run from the wall and try to survive as long as you can! Use the laser to help you in getting to high speeds. Collect the yellow triangles to refill your ammunition. If you touch the wall you will be teleported forward and get glitch points which decrease over time.  Get them to 100 and you will lose!

Warning: Please play in fullscreen mode! The hame might have issues otherwise.
